system.description:
"Whispering Echo: Amplify Charisma, Eclipse Despair."

Once per scene, Spend 1 Hope for advange on a Prescence Roll. If you are a Bard, once per long-rest you may Spend 3 Hope to increase the size of your Bard Die (e.g. from d4 to d6) before giving Bardic Inspriration
